Camera Example
==============

.. |pic6| image:: /images/examples/camera__main__py.png
   :width: 50%
   :align: middle

|pic6|

This example demonstrates a simple use of the camera. It shows a window with a
buttoned labelled 'play' to turn the camera on and off. Note that not finding a
camera, perhaps because gstreamer is not installed, will throw an exception
during the kv language processing.
